CustomField.formula: IF(AND(TEXT(Status__c) = "Not Started", Due_Date__c > TODAY()), 1, IF(AND(TEXT(Status__c) = "Not Started", Due_Date__c < TODAY()), -2, IF(AND(TEXT(Status__c) = "In Progress", Due_Date__c > TODAY()), 2, IF(AND(TEXT(Status__c) = "In Progress", Due_Date__c < TODAY()), 0, IF(TEXT(Status__c) = "Completed", 5, 0)))))
CustomField.label: Health
